name: part_009
file: tmp_【 告知あり 】沙花叉アニソンフェス開催！2周年もありがとう！#沙花叉アニソンフェス 【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [E8HL1I2C_ZQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe and Mori Calliope perform the song 'database feat.TAKUMA(10-FEET)'.
MC section where Chloe and Calli thank the audience and congratulate each other.
MC section where Chloe introduces the next guest, Hoshimachi Suisei.
Sakamata Chloe and Hoshimachi Suisei perform the song 'Don't say "lazy"'.

subtitles.original: 残酷な現実とも見える瓦礫の中で
subtitles.english: In the midst of debris that looks like cruel reality

subtitles.original: 戦い続けるだけ
subtitles.english: I just keep on fighting

subtitles.original: Get them all from bigger heads, yeah!
subtitles.english: Get them all from bigger heads, yeah!

subtitles.original: You get them all from bigger heads!
subtitles.english: You get them all from bigger heads!

subtitles.original: 重なる世界で滾る心に火を灯して
subtitles.english: Light a fire in the boiling heart in overlapping worlds

subtitles.original: Database, database, just living in the database, wow wow
subtitles.english: Database, database, just living in the database, wow wow

subtitles.original: The wall of pure fiction's cracking in my head
subtitles.english: The wall of pure fiction's cracking in my head

subtitles.original: And the addiction of my world's dispersed in the database
subtitles.english: And the addiction of my world's dispersed in the database

subtitles.original: Database, database, I'm struggling in the database, wow wow
subtitles.english: Database, database, I'm struggling in the database, wow wow

subtitles.original: It doesn't even matter if there is no hope
subtitles.english: It doesn't even matter if there is no hope

subtitles.original: Just say wow wow
subtitles.english: Just say wow wow

subtitles.original: Hey wait a minute, what happened? The data's wrong! Come on!
subtitles.english: Hey wait a minute, what happened? The data's wrong! Come on!

subtitles.original: Shake it! Rock it!
subtitles.english: Shake it! Rock it!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's get pumped up!

subtitles.original: 時に計算高さは蛇足で Calculator
subtitles.english: Sometimes calculation is redundant, Calculator

subtitles.original: 統計に揺さぶられたまま消えてった
subtitles.english: It disappeared while being shaken by statistics

subtitles.original: そうなりたくなきゃ Database
subtitles.english: If you don't want that, Database

subtitles.original: だけに頼らず磨け自分のペース yeah
subtitles.english: Don't just rely on that, polish your own pace, yeah

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 楽しかった！
subtitles.english: That was fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったです、最高！
subtitles.english: It was fun, the best!

subtitles.original: 本当に最高の感じ！
subtitles.english: Truly the best feeling!

subtitles.original: いいライブです！
subtitles.english: It's a great live!

subtitles.original: おめでとうございます、クロヱちゃん！
subtitles.english: Congratulations, Chloe-chan!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！本当に嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much! I'm really happy!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 私も楽しかった！
subtitles.english: I had fun too!

subtitles.original: これからも頑張ってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Please keep doing your best!

subtitles.original: 頑張ります！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: I will! Yeah!

subtitles.original: Okay, bye bye!
subtitles.english: Okay, bye bye!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Peace!
subtitles.english: Peace!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで...
subtitles.english: Yes, and so...

subtitles.original: カリ先輩を交えての「database」でした！
subtitles.english: That was "database" with Calli-senpai!

subtitles.original: ではでは、最後のゲスト...
subtitles.english: Now then, the final guest...

subtitles.original: 呼んじゃおうかな？どうしようかな？
subtitles.english: Shall I call them out? What should I do?

subtitles.original: 呼ばないっていう手もありますかね？
subtitles.english: Is there an option not to call them?

subtitles.original: 呼んでよ！
subtitles.english: Call me!

subtitles.original: 来ちゃった！来ちゃった！
subtitles.english: She came! She came!

subtitles.original: 呼んでよ！
subtitles.english: Call me!

subtitles.original: 来ちゃった！どなたですか？
subtitles.english: She came! Who is it?

subtitles.original: 彗星のごとくあらわれたスターの原石！アイドルVTuberの星街すいせいです！よろしくお願いいたします！
subtitles.english: The diamond in the rough that appeared like a comet! I'm Idol VTuber Hoshimachi Suisei! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: ちょっと疲れてるんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Aren't you a bit tired?

subtitles.original: いやいや、まだまだっすよ！
subtitles.english: No no, I'm still going!

subtitles.original: いけるんですか？
subtitles.english: Can you do it?

subtitles.original: いきますよ！
subtitles.english: I'll do it!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、いってやりましょうよ！
subtitles.english: Then let's go for it!

subtitles.original: ぶちこます、あの曲を！
subtitles.english: Let's unleash that song!

subtitles.original: いきまそう！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: いきまそう！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Please don't say you are lazy, だって本当は crazy
subtitles.english: Please don't say you are lazy, because actually you're crazy

subtitles.original: 白鳥たちはそう、見えないとこでバタ足するんです
subtitles.english: Swans are like that, they paddle under the water where you can't see

subtitles.original: 本能に忠順忠実、本能も重々承知
subtitles.english: Obedient and faithful to instinct, well aware of the instinct

subtitles.original: 前途洋々だし、だからたまに休憩しちゃうんです
subtitles.english: The future is bright, so I take a break once in a while

subtitles.original: はいはいはい！すいぐいいけるのか？！
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah yeah! Can you go further?!

subtitles.original: この眼でしっかり定めて行き先、秩序はアクシデント
subtitles.english: Looking firmly with these eyes at the destination, order is an accident

subtitles.original: 近道あればそれが思うツボ、拗ねる翼もあれば上等
subtitles.english: If there's a shortcut, it's just as intended, if there are stubborn wings, even better

subtitles.original: ヤバ、爪は割れた、グルーで補修した
subtitles.english: Oh no, my nail broke, I fixed it with glue

subtitles.original: それだけでなんか達成感
subtitles.english: Just that gives a sense of accomplishment

subtitles.original: 大事なのは自分、可愛がること
subtitles.english: The important thing is to cherish yourself

subtitles.original: 自分を愛さなきゃ、他人も愛せない
subtitles.english: If you don't love yourself, you can't love others

subtitles.original: Please don't say you are lazy, だって本当は crazy
subtitles.english: Please don't say you are lazy, because actually you're crazy

subtitles.original: 能ある鷹はそう、見えないとこでピークを出すんです
subtitles.english: We are like that, we peak where you can't see

subtitles.original: 想像に一生懸命、現実は絶対絶命
subtitles.english: Dedicated to imagination, reality is a desperate situation

subtitles.original: 発展途中だし、だからたまに休憩しちゃうんです
subtitles.english: In the middle of development, so I take a break once in a while
